core: A clean start is available—your path opens when you choose it.
Curiosity is your compass; you don’t need the full plan to begin.
Say yes to the first step and let clarity arrive through movement.
Keep it simple: one honest action that matches your intention.
The start is here, but you may be holding back out of fear or doubt.
Over-planning is delaying the lesson; momentum is the medicine.
Choose the smallest next step and commit—don’t wait for perfect certainty.
If you keep postponing, the same question will return until you act.
